rules.title: Light well & stairwell standards & site planning

qualifiers.scope: Light wells and stairwells in site planning
qualifiers.applicability: Applicable to structures with light wells and stairwells

dimensional.name: combined length of all excavated features

mandatory: Features may not be located on the side facing the front yard
Excavated features shall not be harmful to neighboring trees
Public Works Department must approve drainage system

conditional_logic.condition: if encroaching into required side yard
conditional_logic.requirement: feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot line

logical_dependencies.relationship: a + b (encroaching features) may not exceed 15'
a + b + c + d (all features) may not exceed 30% of the perimeter of the basement
